messages.message: @Cheryl Zhou just confirming the permissions were added to the awsBaseEng role?
I'm getting the same error as before. Did mounting an S3 bucket work for you?

Sorry I don't have this pair of credentials so I didn't test it out myself, although I did mount another S3 bucket that did work.
I think we needed to create a new IAM user (different from the awsBaseEng role), and a new long term access key pair for mounting this S3 bucket as Heymian suggested in the email thread. The same error could be because the key starting with ASIA is a short-lived token and is outdated.
I will reply in the email to have Derrick help us create the new long term key pair needed for mounting
